评论详情: I recently bought this clothing set, and I’m really impressed! The material is soft and lightweight, making it super comfortable to wear all day. The fit is true to size, and the design looks just as good in person as it did online. It’s versatile enough to dress up or keep casual, which I love. My only issue is that the fabric wrinkles easily, but it’s nothing a quick steam can’t fix. Overall, it’s a great set and totally worth the price!

评论概述: Travel Cute & Comfy- Check Sizes Right Away if Traveling Soon
评论详情: Extremely cute in person, the type of 2 piece outfit that looks "polished" and age appropriate for mature women. High quality in fabric and seams- thick so I'm glad it'll be warm w/out coat needed & I can layer a lightweight shirt underneath. However- important to note- the shirt needs to be long & loose enough to cover the top of pants, because they a lil bulky & pulled up high.)  I initially ordered two L's in Black and Brown, but the size didn't fit my thick (5'4 size 14/16.) I reordered an XL & giddy when the pants fit perfectly (high waist for comfy stomach coverage w/out sag.) Sadly, the jacket was too tight and fit like the original L that I'd received the day b4. Took it off & saw an "L" not "XL" & yes I could put it on, but couldn't of closed it over my wealth up top. So bummed that I couldn't use it for my flight the next morning and that's why I'm not rating this review at 5.  Note- At close of this review, I'm reordering the Black & Pink in XL's & hopefully they're packaged correctly. The brown was kinda "different" and so I'll pass on it.
Runs a little big.  I could have sized down
Love this fit style comfort  Just need a smaller size!!

I was pleasantly surprised by this outfit. I'm 5'1 1/2 & the length is perfect. The pants are more of a comfortable body skimming fit. The jacket is like a cropped jacket, but the length is perfect (right at the top of my hip, short torso). The material is super soft & is gentle on the skin. This is so stylish. I would wear this on an airplane ride. You can dress it up or down. I think it is even appropriate for casual Friday work attire (unless you have a more traditional dress code, then I would say no, save it for the weekend). I wash it on cold water & drip dry it. I use my steamer for the jacket & at the waist of the pants. I purchased the cream color & it is wonderful. I going to purchase the caramel colored one. I'm very pleased with my purchase. So pleased I purchased the black set. I believe I will purchase one more.
